# Juan Rueda - Senior Software Engineer

Technical blog and portfolio of Juan Rueda.

## Main Sections

- [Blog](/pepefeliblu) - Technical articles on Frontend, Architecture, and Engineering.
- [About](/pepefeliblu/about) - Professional bio and background.
- [CV](/pepefeliblu/cv) - Curriculum Vitae.

## Recent Posts

- [The Mechanical Turk Redux: Why Your AI Assistant Carries a Wand](/pepefeliblu/blog/the-mechanical-turk-redux) - Why do so many AI tools use mystical imagery? From the original 18th-century illusion to today's LLMs, we explore the theatrical side of artificial intelligence.
- [The Pragmatist's Dilemma: When 'Wrong' Solutions Work Better](/pepefeliblu/blog/the-pragmatists-dilemma) - Why 'inefficient' solutions like Base64 uploads and code-first templates can sometimes be the right choice for maintainability.
- [Google DevFest Quito: A Journey into Modern Engineering](/pepefeliblu/blog/google-devfest-quito) - Key takeaways on Data Architecture, Agentic AI, and Domain-Driven Design from GDG DevFest.
